mapper.select: SELECT SUM(o.totalPrice) FROM ordr o WHERE DATE_FORMAT(o.createdAt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m')
SELECT SUM(o.totalPrice) FROM ordr o WHERE DATE_FORMAT(o.createdAt, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.createdAt, '%Y-%m') as month, SUM(o.totalPrice) as totalPrice FROM ordr o GROUP BY month

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(od.createdAt, '%Y-%m') as month, p.productSeq, MAX(p.name) as name, MAX(p.company) as company, MAX(p.price) as price, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(od.amount) as totalAmount, (SUM(od.amount) * MAX(p.price)) as totalPrice FROM ordrDetail od LEFT JOIN product p ON od.productSeq = p.productSeq WHERE DATE_FORMAT(od.createdAt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') GROUP BY month, p.productSeq ORDER BY totalAmount DESC, price DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT c.parentSeq, MAX(c2.name) as categoryName, SUM(od.amount) as totalAmount FROM ordrDetail od LEFT JOIN product p ON od.productSeq = p.productSeq LEFT JOIN category c ON p.categorySeq = c.categorySeq LEFT JOIN category c2 ON c.parentSeq = c2.categorySeq WHERE DATE_FORMAT(od.createdAt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') GROUP BY c.parentSeq ORDER BY c.parentSeq
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT p.productSeq) FROM ordrDetail od JOIN test.product p ON od.productSeq = p.productSeq WHERE DATE_FORMAT(od.createdAt, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE(), '%Y-%m')
